post.title: New blog post
man only, true for art too; no need to bother the other pole
t artist - we must know his life, the deepest part of his life, to understand and evaluate his art
everything is an art - so is loaning
all fund note should turn private too
should head back, talk to mike on phone and face to face, this is the best way to solve any problem and achieve the best possible result
when we leave the decision making to tony, sure he will make the most responsible decision
on sat morning should talk to mike again about the loan situation

2 months later, after we sold the last 2000 zen hogs at 12.26, today buy back 2000 at 11.22; this is the right trade, 8% rule applied; in a sense, this is a true 2000 yuan made for this shit for the first time.
cock note 2017-09

the upfront fee means the success rate is low, so the broker needs upfront fee to compensate his overall effort of delivery service. if the success rate high and volume high, the upfront fee can be waived and overall fee is low; right now, the volume of loan for foreigners are small, so the upfront fee is a needed income for broker to remain in this business.
3 months past; now is sept 2017, time to sell.
上午的盘面最瘆人，转眼间，曾经的意气风发变成了哀嚎遍野，叫嚣着MSCI是重大利好的砖家已经被骂的连家都找不到了，中外合资的联合收割机比国产收割机威力大多了

- it drifts down
- gold price remains firm, so this down move is purely driven by the weakness in stock
- we are right in selling as much as possible above 10; now below 9.9 we start to buy back

current center is 10
next center we expect to be 9
